main event: Two objects were observed in Woodberry Forest, Virginia on February 15, 1967, for a duration of 75 minutes, with one estimated to travel at a speed of 900 mph before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 75 minutes., Witnesses observed the object moving silently with no emitted sounds., The object was described as capsule-shaped and emitted a flash of light before disappearing., This report was part of the Project Blue Book records, which aimed to investigate UFO sightings., Witnesses considered the objects to be unfamiliar and not regular aircraft.
witness description: A reliable and experienced observer with no rational explanation for the sighting.
